name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Education Development and Studies（ICEDS 2022）
content: Conference Proceedings: ICEDS invites research papers that encompass conceptual analysis, design implementation and performance evaluation. All papers submitted for possible presentation at ICEDS and for publication in the proceedings are subjected to a rigorous, double-blind, peer review process. Accepted excellent papers by ICEDS 2022 will be published by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and sent to be indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science) ICEDS 2022 Proceedings ISBN: 978-1-4503-9627-1
